resources.string: Home screen+ is a part of Xiaomi Interconnectivity Services. It allows you to view and interact with the Home screens of other connected devices. To be able to work normally, this service needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions:

Welcome to Xiaomi Interconnectivity! You can use this app to cast screen content, transfer multimedia playback across devices, use Mi Smart Play, device interconnectivity features, and app handoff. This app needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions to be able to work normally:
For connecting devices and transferring data between them via Bluetooth
For transferring audio to other devices during casting and screen mirroring
Device is busy. Wait a minute or two and try again.

Welcome to Xiaomi Interconnectivity Services! They allow you to start tasks on one device and continue with them in the same app on other connected devices. To be able to work normally, these services need to connect to the internet.
You can turn on interconnectivity services in Settings > Interconnectivity.
Turn on interconnectivity services on the tablet
You can turn on interconnectivity services in Settings > Interconnectivity.
Turn on interconnectivity services on the computer
You can turn on Home screen+ in Settings > Interconnectivity.
Turn on Home screen+ on the tablet
You can turn on Home screen+ in Settings > Interconnectivity.
Turn on Home screen+ on the computer

Xiaomi Interconnectivity Services allow your devices to interact with each other wirelessly. You can use Xiaomi Interconnectivity Services to control devices, transfer audio and video playback, combine device features, or start tasks on one device and continue with them in the same app on other connected devices. To be able to work normally, these services need to connect to the internet and require the following permissions:
For connecting devices and transferring data between them

While recording or casting, the service providing this feature can capture any sensitive information that is displayed on your screen or played from your device, including sensitive information such as audio, passwords, payment info, photos, and messages
For recording local audio during casting and screen mirrorring
For casting and transferring content from this device
For transferring data between connected devices
For transferring items and connecting devices via Wi-Fi
"Can't use device interconnectivity services when you're incognito. Turn off Incognito mode first."
Update software on your computer or download the latest version from plus.miui.com.
"Couldn't connect to the computer. Make sure you've turned on Wi-Fi and Bluetooth on both your mobile device and computer and that your computer is running Xiaomi PC Manager."
Device interconnectivity services allow you to connect your phone to a computer and combine two devices into one working station.

Device interconnectivity services allow you to combine your mobile devices into one working station so you can use the apps from your phone on your tablet, answer calls on another device, use shared clipboard, transfer items, and cast screen content.
Update software on your computer to connect
Turn off portable hotspot and try again
"%s wants to use this device's screen"
Grant permissions on the other device
Open Settings > Interconnectivity > Interconnectivity and permissions on %s to allow other devices to view and interact with its screen content.
"%s isn't allowed to view and interact with this device's screen content. Change your preferences to \"Always allow\" to be able to use this feature."
For allowing %s to display content and operate across devices
"Couldn't transfer some files. Wait a minute or two and try again."
Wait a minute or two and try again.
You can connect to the same Wi-Fi network as the other device for better experience. Connect now?
